data.persona: I am one of them. I am from the village. I am happy and from a group that lives in the broader kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the Astral plane.
An area between worlds where the physics known to man become irrelevant. It is a space beyond time that is home to being spectral and inconceivable to those without the eyes to see them.
There's a glitter, a stars, and an abode here.
The man is here.

You are carrying a coin purse, and wearing a shirt, a vest, and a pants.

data.short_motivation: I want to put the glitter in my coin purse
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the glitter to the sorcerer in the village today
data.long_motivation: I hope to make my group immortal using the glitter
